name.ja: <ruby>湾<rt>わん</rt></ruby><ruby>楽<rt>がっ</rt></ruby><ruby>姫<rt>き</rt></ruby>コルネットラス

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.

effect.en: Excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck. You can add 1 excavated WIND Attribute Warrior Type Normal Monster or 1 "Fusion" to your hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of the Deck in any order. This turn, you can only attack with WIND Attribute Warrior Type monsters.
